                function num2str(n, text_forms) {

<script type="text/javascript">
  (function (retailrocket) {
    'use strict';

    var waitFor = function (exitCondition, callback, force) {
      var checkCount = 100;
      var timeout = 1000;

      (function check() {
        var result = exitCondition();
        if (result) {
          callback(result);
          return;
        }

        if (checkCount === 0) {
          if (force) {
            callback();
          }
          return;
        }

        checkCount -= 1;
        setTimeout(check, timeout);
      }());
    };

    var SwiperModel = function (setting) {
      var $widget = setting.widget;
      var swiperSeector = '.rr-swiper-container';
      var source = 'https://rrstatic.retailrocket.net/widget/plugins/rrswiper/rrswiper.min.js';
      var itemsCount = $widget.getAttribute('data-number-of-rendered-items');

      function checkloop(paramsSlider) {
        var modSetting = paramsSlider;

        if (modSetting.loop == true) {
          for (var point in modSetting.breakpoints) {
            if (itemsCount <= modSetting.breakpoints[point].slidesPerView) {
              modSetting.breakpoints[point].loop = false;
            } else {
              modSetting.breakpoints[point].loop = true;
            }
          }
        }

        return modSetting;
      }

      function render(swiperLibrary) {
        var SwiperParams = checkloop(setting.settingSwiper);
        var $rrContainer = $widget.querySelector(swiperSeector);
        var rrSwiper = swiperLibrary == 'RRSwiper' ? new RRSwiper($rrContainer, SwiperParams) : new Swiper($rrContainer, SwiperParams);

        rrSwiper
          .on('init', function () {
          var $imgError = $widget.querySelectorAll('.rr-swiper-slide:not(.swiper-slide-duplicate) img');
          var counter = 0;
          var indexImg = [];

          $imgError.forEach(function (img) {
            img.onerror = function () {
              var $slideItem = img.closest('.rr-swiper-slide');
              var $slideSiblings = $slideItem.parentNode.querySelectorAll('.rr-swiper-slide:not(.swiper-slide-duplicate)');
              indexImg.push($slideItem.getAttribute('data-swiper-slide-index'));

              if ($imgError.length == counter) {
                rrSwiper.removeSlide(indexImg);
              }
            };
            counter++;
          });
          $widget.classList.add('rr-active');
        })
          .on('observerUpdate', function () {
          rrSwiper.resize.resizeHandler();
        });
        rrSwiper.init();
      }

      function getScript() {
        var swiperJs = document.createElement('script');
        var getElemScript = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
        swiperJs.async = 1;

        if (!window.Swiper && !window.RRSwiper) {
          swiperJs.onload = swiperJs.onreadystatechange = function(_, isAbort) {
            if (isAbort || !swiperJs.readyState || /loaded|complete/.test(swiperJs.readyState) ) {
              swiperJs.onload = swiperJs.onreadystatechange = null;
              swiperJs = undefined;

              if (!isAbort) setTimeout(render('RRSwiper'), 0);
            }
          };

          swiperJs.src = source;
          getElemScript.parentNode.insertBefore(swiperJs, getElemScript);
        } else {
          var versionSwiper = window.hasOwnProperty('RRSwiper') ? 'RRSwiper' : 'Swiper';
          render(versionSwiper);
        }
      }

      this.getScript = getScript;
    };

    function declOfNum(n, titles) {
      return titles[(n % 10 === 1 && n % 100 !== 11) ? 0 : n % 10 >= 2 && n % 10 <= 4 && (n % 100 < 10 || n % 100 >= 20) ? 1 : 2];
    }

    retailrocket['eldorado5c6a9b2197a528263c050ca1'] = (function () {

        "Красота и здоровье/Укладка волос/Мультистайлеры": 1932014815,
        "Красота и здоровье/Укладка волос/Выпрямители/Redmond/RCI-2332": 1932110240,
        "Красота и здоровье/Укладка волос/Фен-щетки/Фен-щетки Braun": 1958833068,
        "Красота и здоровье/Бритье и стрижка/Электробритвы/Moser/3615": 2078073101,
        "Красота и здоровье/Бритье и стрижка/Аксессуары для электробритв": 2100996045,
        "Красота и здоровье/Товары для здоровья/Ирригаторы/Ирригаторы Kitfort": 2112306229

      var container = document.querySelector('[data-retailrocket-markup-block="5c6a9b2197a528263c050ca1"]'),
          stockId = container.getAttribute('data-stock-id'),
          algorithm = '';
      var recomTrackSetting = {
        nameTrack: '',
        abSegment: '',
        check: false,
        listTrack: function()
        {
          return [this.nameTrack, this.nameTrack + 'Category'];
        },
      };
      var impressionContentId = null;
      
      function setStatisticsRender(recoms) {
        if (recomTrackSetting.check) {
          var itemsId = recoms.map(function(product) { return product.ItemId });

          recomTrackSetting.listTrack().forEach(function(track) {
            rrApiOnReady.push(function() {
              rrApi.recomTrack(
                '5c6a9b2197a528263c050ca1',
                0,
                [itemsId],
                {
                  eventType: 'blockRender',
                  abtest: recomTrackSetting.abSegment,
                  algorithm: track
                }
              );
            });
          });
        }
      }

      function setStatisticsShow(recomIds) {
        if (recomTrackSetting.check) {
          recomTrackSetting.listTrack().forEach(function(track) {
            rrApiOnReady.push(function() {
              rrApi.recomTrack(
                '5c6a9b2197a528263c050ca1',
                0,
                [recomIds],
                {
                  eventType: 'blockView',
                  abtest: recomTrackSetting.abSegment,
                  algorithm: track
                }
              );
            });
          });
          
          if (impressionContentId !== null) {
            rrApi.impressionContentViewed({
              impressionContentId: impressionContentId,
              onSuccessCallback: function() {}
            });
          }
        }
      }

      function setStatisticsClick(itemId) {
        if (recomTrackSetting.check) {
          recomTrackSetting.listTrack().forEach(function(track) {
            rrApiOnReady.push(function() {
              rrApi.recomTrack(
                '5c6a9b2197a528263c050ca1',
                0,
                [],
                {
                  eventType: 'blockClick',
                  clickedItem: itemId,
                  abtest: recomTrackSetting.abSegment,
                  algorithm: track
                }
              );
            });
          });
          
          if (impressionContentId !== null) {
            rrApi.impressionContentClicked({
              impressionContentId: impressionContentId,
              onSuccessCallback: function() {}
            });
          }
        }
      }

      function getItems(requireProducts, callback) {
        retailrocket.items.get(
          retailrocket.api.getPartnerId(),
          [requireProducts],
          [stockId],
          callback
        );
      }

      function getPersonalItems(categoryId, callback) {
        retailrocket.recommendation.forPerson(
          retailrocket.api.getPartnerId(),
          retailrocket.api.getSessionId(),
          '',
          'compositeForCategory', 
          {'categoryIds': [categoryId], stock: stockId},
          callback
        );
      }

      function getPopularItems(categoryId, callback) {
        retailrocket.recommendation.forCategories(
          retailrocket.api.getPartnerId(),
          [categoryId],
          'popular',
          {stock: stockId},
          callback
        );
      }

      function getParsedResponse(response) {
        var responseMatch = response.match(/{[^}]+}/).toString();
        var responseParsed = JSON.parse(responseMatch.replace(/([a-zA-Z]+):/g,'"$1":'));

        return responseParsed;
      }

      function getRandomValue(min, max) {
        return Math.round(Math.random() * (max - min) + min);
      }

      function filterIsAvailable(recom) {
        return recom.IsAvailable === true;
      }
      
      function preRenderFn(widget, recoms, renderFn) {
        var categoryPath = '{{data-category-path}}';
        
        getPersonalItems(needCategories[categoryPath], function(personalItems) {
          getPopularItems(needCategories[categoryPath], function(popularItems) {
            if (personalItems.length > 0) {
              recoms = personalItems
            } else {
              recoms = popularItems
            }

            retailrocket.impression.forCategoryPlacement({
              partnerId: retailrocket.api.getPartnerId(),
              placementId: 'b83817be-80b3-4c1b-b3df-99c162e3d500',
              session: retailrocket.api.getSessionId(),
              categoryId: needCategories[categoryPath],
              callbackContents: {
                'string': function (content) {
                  if (typeof content === 'string') {
                    var impressionResponce = content;
                  } else {
                    var impressionResponce = content.string;
                    impressionContentId = content.id;
                  }
                  var impressionResponceParsed = getParsedResponse(impressionResponce);
                  var isRandom = impressionResponceParsed.hasOwnProperty('randomProducts');
                  var impressionRecomIds = isRandom ? impressionResponceParsed.randomProducts[getRandomValue(0, impressionResponceParsed.randomProducts.length - 1)] : impressionResponceParsed.products; 

                  getItems(impressionRecomIds, function(impressionProducts) {
                    var impressionRecoms = impressionProducts
                    .filter(filterIsAvailable)
                    .concat(recoms);
                    
                    if (impressionRecoms.length > 3) {
                      algorithm = 'SP';
                      recomTrackSetting.check = true;
                      recomTrackSetting.nameTrack = impressionResponceParsed.recomTrack;
                      setStatisticsRender(impressionRecoms);

                      renderFn(impressionRecoms);
                      
                      var widgetTitle = widget.querySelector('.widgettitle');
                      widgetTitle.innerText = 'Рекомендуем лично вам';
                    }
                  });
                },
                'empty': function () {
                  if (recoms.length > 3) {
                    algorithm = 'Category';

                    var filteredRecoms = recoms.filter(retailrocket.modules.duplicates.filter);

                    if (filteredRecoms.length > 0) {
                      renderFn(filteredRecoms);
                    }
                  }
                }
              }
            });
          });
        });
      }

      function postRenderFn(widget) {
        var products = widget.querySelectorAll('.retailrocket-item'),
            isShow = false,
            itemsId = [];
        var rrSwiperCarousel = new SwiperModel({
          widget: widget,
          settingSwiper: {
            wrapperClass: 'rr-swiper-wrapper',
            slideClass: 'rr-swiper-slide',
            init: false,
            updateOnWindowResize: true,
            watchOverflow: true,
            observer: true,
            spaceBetween: 0,
            lazy: false,
            touchReleaseOnEdges: true,
            watchSlidesVisibility: true,
            loop: false,
            navigation: {
              prevEl: widget.querySelector('.swiper-prev'),
              nextEl: widget.querySelector('.swiper-next'),
            },
            autoplay: false,
            speed: 300,
            breakpoints: {
              1181: {
                slidesPerView: 3,
                slidesPerGroup: 1
              },
              440: {
                slidesPerView: 2,
                slidesPerGroup: 1
              },
              376: {
                slidesPerView: 2,
                slidesPerGroup: 1
              },
            }
          }
        });
        rrSwiperCarousel.getScript();
        
        products.forEach(function(item) {
          itemsId.push(item.getAttribute('data-id'));
        });

        window.addEventListener('scroll', function() {
          if (!isShow) {
            var  widgetScrollTop = widget.getBoundingClientRect()['top'];
            if (widgetScrollTop < 150) {
              setStatisticsShow(itemsId); 
              isShow = true;
            }
          }
        });
      }

      return {
        declOfNum: declOfNum,
        postRenderFn: postRenderFn,
        preRenderFn: preRenderFn,
        setStatisticsClick: setStatisticsClick
      };
    }());

    retailrocket.widget.render('rr-widget-5c6a9b2197a528263c050ca1');
  }(retailrocket));
</script></div></div></div></div><div data-retailrocket-markup-block="5bbc94d697a52820a47114b6" data-stock-id="5354691" data-search-phrase="polaris" initialized="true"><style type="text/css">

<script type="text/javascript">
  (function (retailrocket) {
    'use strict';

    var waitFor = function (exitCondition, callback, force) {
      var checkCount = 100;
      var timeout = 1000;

      (function check() {
        var result = exitCondition();
        if (result) {
          callback(result);
          return;
        }

        if (checkCount === 0) {
          if (force) {
            callback();
          }
          return;
        }

        checkCount -= 1;
        setTimeout(check, timeout);
      }());
    };

    var SwiperModel = function (setting) {
      var $widget = setting.widget;
      var swiperSeector = '.rr-swiper-container';
      var source = 'https://rrstatic.retailrocket.net/widget/plugins/rrswiper/rrswiper.min.js';
      var itemsCount = $widget.getAttribute('data-number-of-rendered-items');

      function checkloop(paramsSlider) {
        var modSetting = paramsSlider;

        if (modSetting.loop == true) {
          for (var point in modSetting.breakpoints) {
            if (itemsCount <= modSetting.breakpoints[point].slidesPerView) {
              modSetting.breakpoints[point].loop = false;
            } else {
              modSetting.breakpoints[point].loop = true;
            }
          }
        }

        return modSetting;
      }

      function render(swiperLibrary) {
        var SwiperParams = checkloop(setting.settingSwiper);
        var $rrContainer = $widget.querySelector(swiperSeector);
        var rrSwiper = swiperLibrary == 'RRSwiper' ? new RRSwiper($rrContainer, SwiperParams) : new Swiper($rrContainer, SwiperParams);

        rrSwiper
          .on('init', function () {
          var $imgError = $widget.querySelectorAll('.rr-swiper-slide:not(.swiper-slide-duplicate) img');
          var counter = 0;
          var indexImg = [];

          $imgError.forEach(function (img) {
            img.onerror = function () {
              var $slideItem = img.closest('.rr-swiper-slide');
              var $slideSiblings = $slideItem.parentNode.querySelectorAll('.rr-swiper-slide:not(.swiper-slide-duplicate)');
              indexImg.push($slideItem.getAttribute('data-swiper-slide-index'));

              if ($imgError.length == counter) {
                rrSwiper.removeSlide(indexImg);
              }
            };
            counter++;
          });
          $widget.classList.add('rr-active');
        })
          .on('observerUpdate', function () {
          rrSwiper.resize.resizeHandler();
        });
        rrSwiper.init();
      }

      function getScript() {
        var swiperJs = document.createElement('script');
        var getElemScript = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
        swiperJs.async = 1;

        if (!window.Swiper && !window.RRSwiper) {
          swiperJs.onload = swiperJs.onreadystatechange = function(_, isAbort) {
            if (isAbort || !swiperJs.readyState || /loaded|complete/.test(swiperJs.readyState) ) {
              swiperJs.onload = swiperJs.onreadystatechange = null;
              swiperJs = undefined;

              if (!isAbort) setTimeout(render('RRSwiper'), 0);
            }
          };

          swiperJs.src = source;
          getElemScript.parentNode.insertBefore(swiperJs, getElemScript);
        } else {
          var versionSwiper = window.hasOwnProperty('RRSwiper') ? 'RRSwiper' : 'Swiper';
          render(versionSwiper);
        }
      }

      this.getScript = getScript;
    };

    function declOfNum(n, titles) {
      return titles[(n % 10 === 1 && n % 100 !== 11) ? 0 : n % 10 >= 2 && n % 10 <= 4 && (n % 100 < 10 || n % 100 >= 20) ? 1 : 2];
    }

    retailrocket['eldorado5bbc94d697a52820a47114b6'] = (function () {
      function getCookie(name) {
        var nameEQ = name + "=";
        var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
        for(var i=0;i < ca.length;i++) {
          var c = ca[i];
          while (c.charAt(0)==' ') c = c.substring(1,c.length);
          if (c.indexOf(nameEQ) == 0) return c.substring(nameEQ.length,c.length);
        }
        return null;
      }

      function goToCart() {
        var CART_URL = 'https://www.eldorado.ru/personal/basket.php';

        window.location.href = CART_URL;
      }

      function addToCart(button, price, id) {
        var ACTIVE_CLASS = 'active';
        var widget = button.closest('[data-retailrocket-markup-block="5bbc94d697a52820a47114b6"]');
        var buyEvent = new CustomEvent('addToCart', { detail: { price: price, productId: id } });
        var isSPA = location.href !== 'https://www.eldorado.ru/404';

        if (button.classList.contains(ACTIVE_CLASS)) {
          goToCart();
        } else {
          button.classList.add(ACTIVE_CLASS);
          if (isSPA) {
            widget.dispatchEvent(buyEvent);
          } else {
            window.AddToBasketClickHandler(button);
          }
        }
      }

      var container = document.querySelector('[data-retailrocket-markup-block="5bbc94d697a52820a47114b6"]'),
          stockId = container.getAttribute('data-stock-id'),
          algorithm = '';
      var recomTrackSetting = {
        nameTrack: '',
        abSegment: '',
        check: false,
        listTrack: function()
        {
          return [this.nameTrack, this.nameTrack + 'Search'];
        },
      };
      var impressionContentId = null;

      function setStatisticsRender(recoms) {
        if (recomTrackSetting.check) {
          var itemsId = recoms.map(function(product) { return product.ItemId });

          recomTrackSetting.listTrack().forEach(function(track) {
            rrApiOnReady.push(function() {
              rrApi.recomTrack(
                '5bbc94d697a52820a47114b6',
                0,
                [itemsId],
                {
                  eventType: 'blockRender',
                  abtest: recomTrackSetting.abSegment,
                  algorithm: track
                }
              );
            });
          });
        }
      }

      function setStatisticsShow(recomIds) {
        if (recomTrackSetting.check) {
          recomTrackSetting.listTrack().forEach(function(track) {
            rrApiOnReady.push(function() {
              rrApi.recomTrack(
                '5bbc94d697a52820a47114b6',
                0,
                [recomIds],
                {
                  eventType: 'blockView',
                  abtest: recomTrackSetting.abSegment,
                  algorithm: track
                }
              );
            });
          });
          
          if (impressionContentId !== null) {
            rrApi.impressionContentViewed({
              impressionContentId: impressionContentId,
              onSuccessCallback: function() {}
            });
          }
        }
      }

      function setStatisticsClick(itemId) {
        if (recomTrackSetting.check) {
          recomTrackSetting.listTrack().forEach(function(track) {
            rrApiOnReady.push(function() {
              rrApi.recomTrack(
                '5bbc94d697a52820a47114b6',
                0,
                [],
                {
                  eventType: 'blockClick',
                  clickedItem: itemId,
                  abtest: recomTrackSetting.abSegment,
                  algorithm: track
                }
              );
            });
          });
          
          if (impressionContentId !== null) {
            rrApi.impressionContentClicked({
              impressionContentId: impressionContentId,
              onSuccessCallback: function() {}
            });
          }
        }
      }

      function getItems(requireProducts, callback) {
        retailrocket.items.get(
          retailrocket.api.getPartnerId(),
          [requireProducts],
          [stockId],
          callback
        );
      }

      function getParsedResponse(response) {
        var responseMatch = response.match(/{[^}]+}/).toString();
        var responseParsed = JSON.parse(responseMatch.replace(/([a-zA-Z]+):/g,'"$1":'));

        return responseParsed;
      }

      function getRandomValue(min, max) {
        return Math.round(Math.random() * (max - min) + min);
      }

      function filterIsAvailable(recom) {
        return recom.IsAvailable === true;
      }
      
      function preRenderFn(widget, recoms, renderFn) {
        var excludedIds = [1539984, 71554192];
        var itemsInBasketCookie = getCookie('lvBasket')
        
        if (itemsInBasketCookie) {
          var isItemsInBasket = true;
          var itemsInBasket = itemsInBasketCookie.split('%2C');
        } else {
		  var isItemsInBasket = false;
        }
       
        var searchPhrase = widget.getAttribute('data-algorithm-argument');
        
        retailrocket.impression.forSearchPlacement({
          partnerId: retailrocket.api.getPartnerId(),
          placementId: '4c29a9a6-699b-46d9-bfbd-a94e8a12344d',
          session: retailrocket.api.getSessionId(),
          searchQuery: searchPhrase,
          callbackContents: {
            'string': function (content) {
              if (typeof content === 'string') {
                var impressionResponce = content;
              } else {
                var impressionResponce = content.string;
                impressionContentId = content.id;
              }
              
              var impressionResponceParsed = getParsedResponse(impressionResponce);
              var isRandom = impressionResponceParsed.hasOwnProperty('randomProducts');
              var impressionRecomIds = isRandom ? impressionResponceParsed.randomProducts[getRandomValue(0, impressionResponceParsed.randomProducts.length - 1)] : impressionResponceParsed.products; 

              getItems(impressionRecomIds, function(impressionProducts) {
                var impressionRecoms = impressionProducts
                  .filter(filterIsAvailable)
                  .filter(function(recom) {
                    return excludedIds.indexOf(recom.ItemId) == -1;
                  })
                  .concat(recoms);

                if (impressionRecoms.length > 4) {
                  algorithm = 'SP';
                  recomTrackSetting.check = true;
                  recomTrackSetting.nameTrack = impressionResponceParsed.recomTrack;
                  setStatisticsRender(impressionRecoms);

                  if (isItemsInBasket) {
                    impressionRecoms.forEach(function(recom) {
                      if (itemsInBasket.indexOf(recom.ItemId) > -1) {
                        recom.Params.isInBasket = true;
                      } else {
                        recom.Params.isInBasket = false;
                      }
                    });
                  }

                  renderFn(impressionRecoms);
                  
                  var widgetTitle = widget.querySelector('.widgettitle');
                  widgetTitle.innerText = 'Рекомендуем лично вам';
                }
              });
            },
            'empty': function () {
              if (recoms.length > 4) {
                algorithm = 'Search';

                if (isItemsInBasket) {
                  recoms.forEach(function(recom) {
                    if (itemsInBasket.indexOf(recom.ItemId) > -1) {
                      recom.Params.isInBasket = true;
                    } else {
                      recom.Params.isInBasket = false;
                    }
                  });
                }

                renderFn(recoms);
              }
            }
          }
        });
      }

      function postRenderFn(widget) {
        var products = widget.querySelectorAll('.retailrocket-item'),
            isShow = false,
            itemsId = [];
        var rrSwiperCarousel = new SwiperModel({
          widget: widget,
          settingSwiper: {
            wrapperClass: 'rr-swiper-wrapper',
            slideClass: 'rr-swiper-slide',
            init: false,
            updateOnWindowResize: true,
            watchOverflow: true,
            observer: true,
            spaceBetween: 0,
            lazy: false,
            touchReleaseOnEdges: true,
            watchSlidesVisibility: true,
            loop: false,
            navigation: {
              prevEl: widget.querySelector('.swiper-prev'),
              nextEl: widget.querySelector('.swiper-next'),
            },
            autoplay: false,
            speed: 300,
            breakpoints: {
              1240: {
                slidesPerView: 5,
                slidesPerGroup: 1
              },
              769: {
                slidesPerView: 4,
                slidesPerGroup: 1
              },
              580: {
                slidesPerView: 3,
                slidesPerGroup: 1
              },
              420: {
                slidesPerView: 2,
                slidesPerGroup: 1
              },
              320: {
                slidesPerView: 1,
                slidesPerGroup: 1
              },
            }
          }
        });
        rrSwiperCarousel.getScript();
        
        products.forEach(function(item) {
          itemsId.push(item.getAttribute('data-id'));
        });

        window.addEventListener('scroll', function() {
          if (!isShow) {
            var  widgetScrollTop = widget.getBoundingClientRect()['top'];
            if (widgetScrollTop < 150) {
              setStatisticsShow(itemsId); 
              isShow = true;
            }
          }
        });
      }

      return {
        declOfNum: declOfNum,
        postRenderFn: postRenderFn,
        preRenderFn: preRenderFn,
        setStatisticsClick: setStatisticsClick,
        addToCart: addToCart,
      };
    }());

    retailrocket.widget.render('rr-widget-5bbc94d697a52820a47114b6');
  }(retailrocket));
</script></div></div></div></main><div><section class="db"></section><section class="Ca"><div class="Pa"><div class="Ea"><span class="Fa">Оплати до 50% бонусами</span><div class="Ga"><div .59814.26779.59814.59814zm0 4.78516c0 .3303-.2678.5981-.59814.5981H1.59814C1.2678 13.5566 1 13.2888 1 12.9585c0-.3304.2678-.5982.59814-.5982h4.78513c.33034 0 .59814.2678.59814.5982zm2.39256 4.7851c0 .3303-.2678.5981-.59814.5981H1.59814C1.2678 18.3417 1 18.0739 1 17.7436c0-.3304.2678-.5982.59814-.5982h7.17769c.33034 0 .59814.2678.59814.5982z"></path></svg></span>Каталог</button><a href="/personal/basket.php" class="xa"><span class="Aa Ba"><svg viewBox="0 0 20 16" fill="currentColor" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M12.4836 13.0189C11.9617 13.0189 11.5386 13.4416 11.5386 13.963C11.5386 14.4845 11.9617 14.9071 12.4836 14.9071C13.0055 14.9071 13.4286 14.4845 13.4286 13.963C13.4286 13.4416 13.0055 13.0189 12.4836 13.0189ZM10.4443 13.963C10.4443 12.8379 11.3573 11.9258 12.4836 11.9258C13.6099 11.9258 14.5229 12.8379 14.5229 13.963C14.5229 15.0882 13.6099 16.0003 12.4836 16.0003C11.3573 16.0003 10.4443 15.0882 10.4443 13.963Z"></path><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M6.51485 13.0189C5.99293 13.0189 5.56983 13.4416 5.56983 13.963C5.56983 14.4845 5.99293 14.9071 6.51485 14.9071C7.03678 14.9071 7.45988 14.4845 7.45988 13.963C7.45988 13.4416 7.03678 13.0189 6.51485 13.0189ZM4.47559 13.963C4.47559 12.8379 5.38859 11.9258 6.51485 11.9258C7.64111 11.9258 8.55412 12.8379 8.55412 13.963C8.55412 15.0882 7.64111 16.0003 6.51485 16.0003C5.38859 16.0003 4.47559 15.0882 4.47559 13.963Z"></path><path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M0 0.546584C0 0.244714 0.244954 0 0.547121 0H3.25866C3.57425 0 3.84373 0.227598 3.89624 0.53848L4.30887 2.98137H15.3532C15.7531 2.98137 16.0571 3.34028 15.9909 3.73423L14.8558 10.492C14.8036 10.8031 14.5339 11.0311 14.2181 11.0311H5.10545C4.78986 11.0311 4.52037 10.8035 4.46786 10.4926L2.88022 1.09317H0.547121C0.244954 1.09317 0 0.848454 0 0.546584ZM4.49351 4.07453L5.48388 9.93789H13.8394L14.8242             <% if (Params.reviews) { %>
              <%
                function num2str(n, text_forms) {
                  n = Math.abs(n) % 100; var n1 = n % 10;
                  if (n > 10 && n < 20) { return text_forms[2]; }
                  if (n1 > 1 && n1 < 5) { return text_forms[1]; }
                  if (n1 == 1) { return text_forms[0]; }
                  return text_forms[2];
                };
              %>
              <a class="rr-reviews" href="<%=Params.reviews_link %>"><%=Params.reviews %><span> <%=num2str(Params.reviews, ['Отзыв','Отзыва','Отзывов'])%></span></a>
            <% } %>
          </div>
          <div class="item-name-block">
            <a class="item-info-link" href="<%=Url%>" onmousedown='rrApi.recomMouseDown(<%=ItemId%>, { suggester: "<%=suggesterId%>", methodName: "<%=algorithm%>" });retailrocket["eldorado5c6a9b2197a528263c050ca1"].setStatisticsClick(<%=ItemId%>)'>
              <%=Name %>
            </a>
          </div>
          <div class="item-block-price">
            <div class="item-old-price">
              <% if (OldPrice > Price && !Params.price_ut) { %>
                <span class="item-old-price-value"><%= retailrocket.widget.formatNumber(OldPrice, '.', ' ', 0) %><span class="line-through"></span> <span class="rub">р.</span></span> <span class="item-price-discount">-<%=Math.round(OldPrice - Price) %></span>
              <% } %>
            </div>
            <div class="item-price"> <span class="item-price-value"><%= retailrocket.widget.formatNumber(Price, '.', ' ', 0) %> <span class="rub">р.</span></span> <span class="item-price-currency"></span> </div>
          </div>
          <div class="item-actions cart-icon">
            <a class="item-actions-buy addToCart cartButton" data-price="<%=Price%>" data-xid="<%=ItemId%>" onclick='AddToBasketClickHandler(this);rrApi.recomAddToCart(<%=ItemId%>, { suggester: "<%=suggesterId%>", methodName: "<%=algorithm%>" });return retailrocket._widgetAddToBasket("<%=ItemId%>", "<%=onAddToBasket%>")'><span class="cart-icon-add"></span></a>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
      <% } %>
    </div>
  </div>

  <div class="rr-slider-arrow">
    <a class="rr-arrow swiper-prev"></a>
    <a class="rr-arrow swiper-next"></a>
  </div>
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
  (function (retailrocket) {
    'use strict';

    var waitFor = function (exitCondition, callback, force) {
      var checkCount = 100;
      var timeout = 1000;

      (function check() {
        var result = exitCondition();
        if (result) {
          callback(result);
          return;
        }

        if (checkCount === 0) {
          if (force) {
            callback();
          }
          return;
        }

        checkCount -= 1;
        setTimeout(check, timeout);
      }());
    };

    var SwiperModel = function (setting) {
      var $widget = setting.widget;
      var swiperSeector = '.rr-swiper-container';
      var source = 'https://rrstatic.retailrocket.net/widget/plugins/rrswiper/rrswiper.min.js';
      var itemsCount = $widget.getAttribute('data-number-of-rendered-items');

      function checkloop(paramsSlider) {
        var modSetting = paramsSlider;

        if (modSetting.loop == true) {
          for (var point in modSetting.breakpoints) {
            if (itemsCount <= modSetting.breakpoints[point].slidesPerView) {
              modSetting.breakpoints[point].loop = false;
            } else {
              modSetting.breakpoints[point].loop = true;
            }
          }
        }

        return modSetting;
      }

      function render(swiperLibrary) {
        var SwiperParams = checkloop(setting.settingSwiper);
        var $rrContainer = $widget.querySelector(swiperSeector);
        var rrSwiper = swiperLibrary == 'RRSwiper' ? new RRSwiper($rrContainer, SwiperParams) : new Swiper($rrContainer, SwiperParams);

        rrSwiper
          .on('init', function () {
          var $imgError = $widget.querySelectorAll('.rr-swiper-slide:not(.swiper-slide-duplicate) img');
          var counter = 0;
          var indexImg = [];

          $imgError.forEach(function (img) {
            img.onerror = function () {
              var $slideItem = img.closest('.rr-swiper-slide');
              var $slideSiblings = $slideItem.parentNode.querySelectorAll('.rr-swiper-slide:not(.swiper-slide-duplicate)');
              indexImg.push($slideItem.getAttribute('data-swiper-slide-index'));

              if ($imgError.length == counter) {
                rrSwiper.removeSlide(indexImg);
              }
            };
            counter++;
          });
          $widget.classList.add('rr-active');
        })
          .on('observerUpdate', function () {
          rrSwiper.resize.resizeHandler();
        });
        rrSwiper.init();
      }

      function getScript() {
        var swiperJs = document.createElement('script');
        var getElemScript = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
        swiperJs.async = 1;

        if (!window.Swiper && !window.RRSwiper) {
          swiperJs.onload = swiperJs.onreadystatechange = function(_, isAbort) {
            if (isAbort || !swiperJs.readyState || /loaded|complete/.test(swiperJs.readyState) ) {
              swiperJs.onload = swiperJs.onreadystatechange = null;
              swiperJs = undefined;

              if (!isAbort) setTimeout(render('RRSwiper'), 0);
            }
          };

          swiperJs.src = source;
          getElemScript.parentNode.insertBefore(swiperJs, getElemScript);
        } else {
          var versionSwiper = window.hasOwnProperty('RRSwiper') ? 'RRSwiper' : 'Swiper';
          render(versionSwiper);
        }
      }

      this.getScript = getScript;
    };

    function declOfNum(n, titles) {
      return titles[(n % 10 === 1 && n % 100 !== 11) ? 0 : n % 10 >= 2 && n % 10 <= 4 && (n % 100 < 10 || n % 100 >= 20) ? 1 : 2];
    }

        "Красота и здоровье/Укладка волос/Фен-щетки/Фен-щетки Braun": 1958833068,
        "Красота и здоровье/Бритье и стрижка/Электробритвы/Moser/3615": 2078073101,
        "Красота и здоровье/Бритье и стрижка/Аксессуары для электробритв": 2100996045,
        "Красота и здоровье/Товары для здоровья/Ирригаторы/Ирригаторы Kitfort": 2112306229
      };
      
      var container = document.querySelector('[data-retailrocket-markup-block="5c6a9b2197a528263c050ca1"]'),
          stockId = container.getAttribute('data-stock-id'),
          algorithm = '';
      var recomTrackSetting = {
        nameTrack: '',
        abSegment: '',
        check: false,
        listTrack: function()
        {
          return [this.nameTrack, this.nameTrack + 'Category'];
        },
      };
      var impressionContentId = null;
      
      function setStatisticsRender(recoms) {
        if (recomTrackSetting.check) {
          var itemsId = recoms.map(function(product) { return product.ItemId });

          recomTrackSetting.listTrack().forEach(function(track) {
            rrApiOnReady.push(function() {
              rrApi.recomTrack(
                '5c6a9b2197a528263c050ca1',
                0,
                [itemsId],
                {
                  eventType: 'blockRender',
                  abtest: recomTrackSetting.abSegment,
                  algorithm: track
                }
              );
            });
          });
        }
      }

      function setStatisticsShow(recomIds) {
        if (recomTrackSetting.check) {
          recomTrackSetting.listTrack().forEach(function(track) {
            rrApiOnReady.push(function() {
              rrApi.recomTrack(
                '5c6a9b2197a528263c050ca1',
                0,
                [recomIds],
                {
                  eventType: 'blockView',
                  abtest: recomTrackSetting.abSegment,
                  algorithm: track
                }
              );
            });
          });
          
          if (impressionContentId !== null) {
            rrApi.impressionContentViewed({
              impressionContentId: impressionContentId,
              onSuccessCallback: function() {}
            });
          }
        }
      }

      function setStatisticsClick(itemId) {
        if (recomTrackSetting.check) {
          recomTrackSetting.listTrack().forEach(function(track) {
            rrApiOnReady.push(function() {
              rrApi.recomTrack(
                '5c6a9b2197a528263c050ca1',
                0,
                [],
                {
                  eventType: 'blockClick',
                  clickedItem: itemId,
                  abtest: recomTrackSetting.abSegment,
                  algorithm: track
                }
              );
            });
          });
          
          if (impressionContentId !== null) {
            rrApi.impressionContentClicked({
              impressionContentId: impressionContentId,
              onSuccessCallback: function() {}
            });
          }
        }
      }

      function getItems(requireProducts, callback) {
        retailrocket.items.get(
          retailrocket.api.getPartnerId(),
          [requireProducts],
          [stockId],
          callback
        );
      }

      function getPersonalItems(categoryId, callback) {
        retailrocket.recommendation.forPerson(
          retailrocket.api.getPartnerId(),
          retailrocket.api.getSessionId(),
          '',
          'compositeForCategory', 
          {'categoryIds': [categoryId], stock: stockId},
          callback
        );
      }

      function getPopularItems(categoryId, callback) {
        retailrocket.recommendation.forCategories(
          retailrocket.api.getPartnerId(),
          [categoryId],
          'popular',
          {stock: stockId},
          callback
        );
      }

      function getParsedResponse(response) {
        var responseMatch = response.match(/{[^}]+}/).toString();
        var responseParsed = JSON.parse(responseMatch.replace(/([a-zA-Z]+):/g,'"$1":'));

        return responseParsed;
      }

      function getRandomValue(min, max) {
        return Math.round(Math.random() * (max - min) + min);
      }

      function filterIsAvailable(recom) {
        return recom.IsAvailable === true;
      }
      
      function preRenderFn(widget, recoms, renderFn) {
        var categoryPath = '{{data-category-path}}';
        
        getPersonalItems(needCategories[categoryPath], function(personalItems) {
          getPopularItems(needCategories[categoryPath], function(popularItems) {
            if (personalItems.length > 0) {
              recoms = personalItems
            } else {
              recoms = popularItems
            }

            retailrocket.impression.forCategoryPlacement({
              partnerId: retailrocket.api.getPartnerId(),
              placementId: 'b83817be-80b3-4c1b-b3df-99c162e3d500',
              session: retailrocket.api.getSessionId(),
              categoryId: needCategories[categoryPath],
              callbackContents: {
                'string': function (content) {
                  if (typeof content === 'string') {
                    var impressionResponce = content;
                  } else {
                    var impressionResponce = content.string;
                    impressionContentId = content.id;
                  }
                  var impressionResponceParsed = getParsedResponse(impressionResponce);
                  var isRandom = impressionResponceParsed.hasOwnProperty('randomProducts');
                  var impressionRecomIds = isRandom ? impressionResponceParsed.randomProducts[getRandomValue(0, impressionResponceParsed.randomProducts.length - 1)] : impressionResponceParsed.products; 

                  getItems(impressionRecomIds, function(impressionProducts) {
                    var impressionRecoms = impressionProducts
                    .filter(filterIsAvailable)
                    .concat(recoms);
                    
                    if (impressionRecoms.length > 3) {
                      algorithm = 'SP';
                      recomTrackSetting.check = true;
                      recomTrackSetting.nameTrack = impressionResponceParsed.recomTrack;
                      setStatisticsRender(impressionRecoms);

                      renderFn(impressionRecoms);
                      
                      var widgetTitle = widget.querySelector('.widgettitle');
                      widgetTitle.innerText = 'Рекомендуем лично вам';
                    }
                  });
                },
                'empty': function () {
                  if (recoms.length > 3) {
                    algorithm = 'Category';

                    var filteredRecoms = recoms.filter(retailrocket.modules.duplicates.filter);

                    if (filteredRecoms.length > 0) {
                      renderFn(filteredRecoms);
                    }
                  }
                }
              }
            });
          });
        });
      }

      function postRenderFn(widget) {
        var products = widget.querySelectorAll('.retailrocket-item'),
            isShow = false,
            itemsId = [];
        var rrSwiperCarousel = new SwiperModel({
          widget: widget,
          settingSwiper: {
            wrapperClass: 'rr-swiper-wrapper',
            slideClass: 'rr-swiper-slide',
            init: false,
            updateOnWindowResize: true,
            watchOverflow: true,
            observer: true,
            spaceBetween: 0,
            lazy: false,
            touchReleaseOnEdges: true,
            watchSlidesVisibility: true,
            loop: false,
            navigation: {
              prevEl: widget.querySelector('.swiper-prev'),
              nextEl: widget.querySelector('.swiper-next'),
            },
            autoplay: false,
            speed: 300,
            breakpoints: {
              1181: {
                slidesPerView: 3,
                slidesPerGroup: 1
              },
              440: {
                slidesPerView: 2,
                slidesPerGroup: 1
              },
              376: {
                slidesPerView: 2,
                slidesPerGroup: 1
              },
            }
          }
        });
        rrSwiperCarousel.getScript();
        
        products.forEach(function(item) {
          itemsId.push(item.getAttribute('data-id'));
        });

        window.addEventListener('scroll', function() {
          if (!isShow) {
            var  widgetScrollTop = widget.getBoundingClientRect()['top'];
            if (widgetScrollTop < 150) {
              setStatisticsShow(itemsId); 
              isShow = true;
            }
          }
        });
      }

      return {
        declOfNum: declOfNum,
        postRenderFn: postRenderFn,
        preRenderFn: preRenderFn,
        setStatisticsClick: setStatisticsClick
      };
    }());

    retailrocket.widget.render('rr-widget-5c6a9b2197a528263c050ca1');
  }(retailrocket));
</script></div></div></div></div><div data-retailrocket-markup-block="5bbc94d697a52820a47114b6" data-stock-id="6008324" data-search-phrase="polaris" initialized="true"><style type="text/css">

                function num2str(n, text_forms) {

                };

<script type="text/javascript">
  (function (retailrocket) {
    'use strict';

    var waitFor = function (exitCondition, callback, force) {
      var checkCount = 100;
      var timeout = 1000;

      (function check() {
        var result = exitCondition();
        if (result) {
          callback(result);
          return;
        }

        if (checkCount === 0) {
          if (force) {
            callback();
          }
          return;
        }

        checkCount -= 1;
        setTimeout(check, timeout);
      }());
    };

    var SwiperModel = function (setting) {
      var $widget = setting.widget;
      var swiperSeector = '.rr-swiper-container';
      var source = 'https://rrstatic.retailrocket.net/widget/plugins/rrswiper/rrswiper.min.js';
      var itemsCount = $widget.getAttribute('data-number-of-rendered-items');

      function checkloop(paramsSlider) {
        var modSetting = paramsSlider;

        if (modSetting.loop == true) {
          for (var point in modSetting.breakpoints) {
            if (itemsCount <= modSetting.breakpoints[point].slidesPerView) {
              modSetting.breakpoints[point].loop = false;
            } else {
              modSetting.breakpoints[point].loop = true;
            }
          }
        }

        return modSetting;
      }

      function render(swiperLibrary) {
        var SwiperParams = checkloop(setting.settingSwiper);
        var $rrContainer = $widget.querySelector(swiperSeector);
        var rrSwiper = swiperLibrary == 'RRSwiper' ? new RRSwiper($rrContainer, SwiperParams) : new Swiper($rrContainer, SwiperParams);

        rrSwiper
          .on('init', function () {
          var $imgError = $widget.querySelectorAll('.rr-swiper-slide:not(.swiper-slide-duplicate) img');
          var counter = 0;
          var indexImg = [];

          $imgError.forEach(function (img) {
            img.onerror = function () {
              var $slideItem = img.closest('.rr-swiper-slide');
              var $slideSiblings = $slideItem.parentNode.querySelectorAll('.rr-swiper-slide:not(.swiper-slide-duplicate)');
              indexImg.push($slideItem.getAttribute('data-swiper-slide-index'));

              if ($imgError.length == counter) {
                rrSwiper.removeSlide(indexImg);
              }
            };
            counter++;
          });
          $widget.classList.add('rr-active');
        })
          .on('observerUpdate', function () {
          rrSwiper.resize.resizeHandler();
        });
        rrSwiper.init();
      }

      function getScript() {
        var swiperJs = document.createElement('script');
        var getElemScript = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
        swiperJs.async = 1;

        if (!window.Swiper && !window.RRSwiper) {
          swiperJs.onload = swiperJs.onreadystatechange = function(_, isAbort) {
            if (isAbort || !swiperJs.readyState || /loaded|complete/.test(swiperJs.readyState) ) {
              swiperJs.onload = swiperJs.onreadystatechange = null;
              swiperJs = undefined;

              if (!isAbort) setTimeout(render('RRSwiper'), 0);
            }
          };

          swiperJs.src = source;
          getElemScript.parentNode.insertBefore(swiperJs, getElemScript);
        } else {
          var versionSwiper = window.hasOwnProperty('RRSwiper') ? 'RRSwiper' : 'Swiper';
          render(versionSwiper);
        }
      }

      this.getScript = getScript;
    };

    function declOfNum(n, titles) {
      return titles[(n % 10 === 1 && n % 100 !== 11) ? 0 : n % 10 >= 2 && n % 10 <= 4 && (n % 100 < 10 || n % 100 >= 20) ? 1 : 2];
    }

    retailrocket['eldorado5bbc94d697a52820a47114b6'] = (function () {
      function getCookie(name) {
        var nameEQ = name + "=";
        var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
        for(var i=0;i < ca.length;i++) {
          var c = ca[i];
          while (c.charAt(0)==' ') c = c.substring(1,c.length);
          if (c.indexOf(nameEQ) == 0) return c.substring(nameEQ.length,c.length);
        }
        return null;
      }

      function goToCart() {
        var CART_URL = 'https://www.eldorado.ru/personal/basket.php';

        window.location.href = CART_URL;
      }

      function addToCart(button, price, id) {
        var ACTIVE_CLASS = 'active';
        var widget = button.closest('[data-retailrocket-markup-block="5bbc94d697a52820a47114b6"]');
        var buyEvent = new CustomEvent('addToCart', { detail: { price: price, productId: id } });
        var isSPA = location.href !== 'https://www.eldorado.ru/404';

        if (button.classList.contains(ACTIVE_CLASS)) {
          goToCart();
        } else {
          button.classList.add(ACTIVE_CLASS);
          if (isSPA) {
            widget.dispatchEvent(buyEvent);
          } else {
            window.AddToBasketClickHandler(button);
          }
        }
      }

      var container = document.querySelector('[data-retailrocket-markup-block="5bbc94d697a52820a47114b6"]'),
          stockId = container.getAttribute('data-stock-id'),
          algorithm = '';
      var recomTrackSetting = {
        nameTrack: '',
        abSegment: '',
        check: false,
        listTrack: function()
        {
          return [this.nameTrack, this.nameTrack + 'Search'];
        },
      };
      var impressionContentId = null;

      function setStatisticsRender(recoms) {
        if (recomTrackSetting.check) {
          var itemsId = recoms.map(function(product) { return product.ItemId });

          recomTrackSetting.listTrack().forEach(function(track) {
            rrApiOnReady.push(function() {
              rrApi.recomTrack(
                '5bbc94d697a52820a47114b6',
                0,
                [itemsId],
                {
                  eventType: 'blockRender',
                  abtest: recomTrackSetting.abSegment,
                  algorithm: track
                }
              );
            });
          });
        }
      }

      function setStatisticsShow(recomIds) {
        if (recomTrackSetting.check) {
          recomTrackSetting.listTrack().forEach(function(track) {
            rrApiOnReady.push(function() {
              rrApi.recomTrack(
                '5bbc94d697a52820a47114b6',
                0,
                [recomIds],
                {
                  eventType: 'blockView',
                  abtest: recomTrackSetting.abSegment,
                  algorithm: track
                }
              );
            });
          });
          
          if (impressionContentId !== null) {
            rrApi.impressionContentViewed({
              impressionContentId: impressionContentId,
              onSuccessCallback: function() {}
            });
          }
        }
      }

      function setStatisticsClick(itemId) {
        if (recomTrackSetting.check) {
          recomTrackSetting.listTrack().forEach(function(track) {
            rrApiOnReady.push(function() {
              rrApi.recomTrack(
                '5bbc94d697a52820a47114b6',
                0,
                [],
                {
                  eventType: 'blockClick',
                  clickedItem: itemId,
                  abtest: recomTrackSetting.abSegment,
                  algorithm: track
                }
              );
            });
          });
          
          if (impressionContentId !== null) {
            rrApi.impressionContentClicked({
              impressionContentId: impressionContentId,
              onSuccessCallback: function() {}
            });
          }
        }
      }

      function getItems(requireProducts, callback) {
        retailrocket.items.get(
          retailrocket.api.getPartnerId(),
          [requireProducts],
          [stockId],
          callback
        );
      }

      function getParsedResponse(response) {
        var responseMatch = response.match(/{[^}]+}/).toString();
        var responseParsed = JSON.parse(responseMatch.replace(/([a-zA-Z]+):/g,'"$1":'));

        return responseParsed;
      }

      function getRandomValue(min, max) {
        return Math.round(Math.random() * (max - min) + min);
      }

      function filterIsAvailable(recom) {
        return recom.IsAvailable === true;
      }
      
      function preRenderFn(widget, recoms, renderFn) {
        var excludedIds = [1539984, 71554192];
        var itemsInBasketCookie = getCookie('lvBasket')
        
        if (itemsInBasketCookie) {
          var isItemsInBasket = true;
          var itemsInBasket = itemsInBasketCookie.split('%2C');
        } else {
		  var isItemsInBasket = false;
        }
       
        var searchPhrase = widget.getAttribute('data-algorithm-argument');
        
        retailrocket.impression.forSearchPlacement({
          partnerId: retailrocket.api.getPartnerId(),
          placementId: '4c29a9a6-699b-46d9-bfbd-a94e8a12344d',
          session: retailrocket.api.getSessionId(),
          searchQuery: searchPhrase,
          callbackContents: {
            'string': function (content) {
              if (typeof content === 'string') {
                var impressionResponce = content;
              } else {
                var impressionResponce = content.string;
                impressionContentId = content.id;
              }
              
              var impressionResponceParsed = getParsedResponse(impressionResponce);
              var isRandom = impressionResponceParsed.hasOwnProperty('randomProducts');
              var impressionRecomIds = isRandom ? impressionResponceParsed.randomProducts[getRandomValue(0, impressionResponceParsed.randomProducts.length - 1)] : impressionResponceParsed.products; 

              getItems(impressionRecomIds, function(impressionProducts) {
                var impressionRecoms = impressionProducts
                  .filter(filterIsAvailable)
                  .filter(function(recom) {
                    return excludedIds.indexOf(recom.ItemId) == -1;
                  })
                  .concat(recoms);

                if (impressionRecoms.length > 4) {
                  algorithm = 'SP';
                  recomTrackSetting.check = true;
                  recomTrackSetting.nameTrack = impressionResponceParsed.recomTrack;
                  setStatisticsRender(impressionRecoms);

                  if (isItemsInBasket) {
                    impressionRecoms.forEach(function(recom) {
                      if (itemsInBasket.indexOf(recom.ItemId) > -1) {
                        recom.Params.isInBasket = true;
                      } else {
                        recom.Params.isInBasket = false;
                      }
                    });
                  }

                  renderFn(impressionRecoms);
                  
                  var widgetTitle = widget.querySelector('.widgettitle');
                  widgetTitle.innerText = 'Рекомендуем лично вам';
                }
              });
            },
            'empty': function () {
              if (recoms.length > 4) {
                algorithm = 'Search';

                if (isItemsInBasket) {
                  recoms.forEach(function(recom) {
                    if (itemsInBasket.indexOf(recom.ItemId) > -1) {
                      recom.Params.isInBasket = true;
                    } else {
                      recom.Params.isInBasket = false;
                    }
                  });
                }

                renderFn(recoms);
              }
            }
          }
        });
      }

      function postRenderFn(widget) {
        var products = widget.querySelectorAll('.retailrocket-item'),
            isShow = false,
            itemsId = [];
        var rrSwiperCarousel = new SwiperModel({
          widget: widget,
          settingSwiper: {
            wrapperClass: 'rr-swiper-wrapper',
            slideClass: 'rr-swiper-slide',
            init: false,
            updateOnWindowResize: true,
            watchOverflow: true,
            observer: true,
            spaceBetween: 0,
            lazy: false,
            touchReleaseOnEdges: true,
            watchSlidesVisibility: true,
            loop: false,
            navigation: {
              prevEl: widget.querySelector('.swiper-prev'),
              nextEl: widget.querySelector('.swiper-next'),
            },
            autoplay: false,
            speed: 300,
            breakpoints: {
              1240: {
                slidesPerView: 5,
                slidesPerGroup: 1
              },
              769: {
                slidesPerView: 4,
                slidesPerGroup: 1
              },
              580: {
                slidesPerView: 3,
                slidesPerGroup: 1
              },
              420: {
                slidesPerView: 2,
                slidesPerGroup: 1
              },
              320: {
                slidesPerView: 1,
                slidesPerGroup: 1
              },
            }
          }
        });
        rrSwiperCarousel.getScript();
        
        products.forEach(function(item) {
          itemsId.push(item.getAttribute('data-id'));
        });

        window.addEventListener('scroll', function() {
          if (!isShow) {
            var  widgetScrollTop = widget.getBoundingClientRect()['top'];
            if (widgetScrollTop < 150) {
              setStatisticsShow(itemsId); 
              isShow = true;
            }
          }
        });
      }

      return {
        declOfNum: declOfNum,
        postRenderFn: postRenderFn,
        preRenderFn: preRenderFn,
        setStatisticsClick: setStatisticsClick,
        addToCart: addToCart,
      };
    }());

    retailrocket.widget.render('rr-widget-5bbc94d697a52820a47114b6');
  }(retailrocket));
</script></div></div></div></main><div><section class="db"></section><section class="Ca"><div class="Pa"><div class="Ea"><span class="Fa">Оплати до 50% бонусами</span><div class="Ga"><div
